scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix frontend && npm install --prefix backend
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix frontend" "npm run start:dev --prefix backend"
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix backend
scripts.test: npm run test --prefix frontend && npm run test --prefix backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint --prefix frontend && npm run lint --prefix backend
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck --prefix frontend && npm run typecheck --prefix backend
